thread.section_title: Khloe Kardashian News, Videos and Photos of the KUWTK star | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: helps Lauren drop 50 pounds on E! show
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian helps Lauren drop 50 pounds on E! show | Daily Mail Online

author: Paul Chavez For Dailymail.com
title: helps Lauren drop 50 pounds on E! show
text:
Khloe Kardashian helped Lauren Hennessey lose 50 pounds with the help of a celebrity trainer on Thursday's episode of Revenge Body.
The 32-year-old reality star extended her services to the supernatural and also connected Lauren with her dead father with the aid of celebrity medium Tyler Henry.
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star also helped former meth addict Jessy Clark lose 30 pounds in the episode titled The Former Addict & The Future Bride.
Extended services: Khloe Kardashian extended her services to the supernatural on Thursday's episode of Revenge Body on the E! network
Lauren upon first meeting Khloe told how her father died during a family cruise for her 18th birthday in Maui, Hawaii.
She said that her father who was a 'strong swimmer' drowned in an accident.
Khloe related and told Lauren that her father died in 2003 when she was age 19.
'My spiral was food. I gained so much weight,' Khloe said.
Seeking revenge: Lauren Hennessey was seeking revenge against her brother Martin who taunted her for being fat
'But you can't let tragic things ruin the rest of our lives,' she added.
Khloe set up Lauren with celebrity trainer Jorge Cruise who boasted of his celebrity clientele including Oprah Winfrey and Steve Harvey.
Lauren weighed in at 275 pounds and struggled during her initial workout with Jorge.
Initial workout: The bride-to-be struggled during her first workout with celebrity trainer Jorge Cruise
She grew frustrated at her slow progress and feared she would be cut from the show during a meeting with Khloe.
Khloe however just wanted to tell her about the meeting she arranged with 21-year-old clairvoyant Tyler.
'Our loves ones are speaking to us. Like my dad said, you know, something about birds when he was passing away,' Khloe told Lauren.
Special meeting: Khloe met with Lauren after arranging a session with Hollywood medium Tyler Henry
Getting emotional: Lauren got emotional while talking to Khloe about her late father
'And now there's like two birds that live outside Kim and Kanye's house and they always say one's my dad and one is Kanye's mom. That gives me like peace,' she said referencing her famous sister and her rapper husband.
Tyler claimed that Khloe didn't tell him anything about Lauren and quickly established a connection with her late father.
The Hollywood medium told Lauren that her father was referencing her brother and was worried about his health.
No clue: Tyler claimed that Khloe did not tell him anything about Lauren
Beyond the grave: Lauren got the validation she was seeking from her father via Tyler
Lauren also got the validation she was seeking from her father and admitted the session gave her a nudge.
Jorge a few days before Lauren reveal reported that she lost 50 pounds.
Lauren surprised her brother Martin, mother Gillian and fiance Ish during her reveal.
Exercise nudge: The session with Tyler gave Lauren the nudge she needed to not give up
Diet changes: Jorge went over the exercise and diet plan with Lauren
Working out: Lauren opened up to Jorge about her fears
'You look amazing,' Martin told her.
Lauren then explained to her brother how his teasing about her weight hurt her feelings.
Martin earnestly apologized and promised to tone it down.
Extra room: Khloe was amazed at the inches Lauren had lost
Candid conversation: Lauren told her brother Martin about her hurt feelings
He also promised to improve his lifestyle so his three boys don't lose their father.
Jessy expressed early doubts with her celebrity trainer Harley Pasternak.
The former meth addict however recommitted and started shedding the pounds.
Drug addict: Jessy gained weight after kicking her addiction to meth
Having doubt: Harley was being doubted by Jessy but got her to commit to the program
She stunned her mother Judy during her reveal as her husband Colin looked on.
Jessy also got a rare apology from her mother who followed her own strict military upbringing while raising her daughter.
Revenge Body will return next week on the E! network.
Rare apology: Judy offered her daughter something she never got from her own father and apologized for being too hard on her
Before and after: Jessy lost 30 pounds in 12 weeks
Keeping up: An update said Jessy lost eight more pounds and hopes to have a baby in 2018
